testCases.label: Verify lookup of a book by ISBN
testCases.description: Ensures that saving a book with a specific ISBN allows retrieval through the repository's findBookByIsbn method and that the returned book has the expected ISBN.

testCases.label: Verify lookup of books by author
testCases.description: Checks that multiple books saved with the same author can be retrieved using findBooksByAuthor and that the number of results matches the number of saved entries.

testCases.label: Verify lookup of books by author and date added
testCases.description: Confirms that a book saved with a specific author and dateAdded is correctly returned when querying with findBooksByAuthorAndDateAdded.

testCases.label: Verify lookup of a book by title
testCases.description: Uses reflection to invoke the trainee-implemented find-by-title method and ensures a saved book with a given title can be retrieved and matches the expected title.

testCases.label: Verify lookup of books by availability
testCases.description: Ensures that the repository's find-by-availability method returns only books marked as available and that the result count matches the number of available books saved.

testCases.label: Verify lookup of books by date added or last date withdrawn
testCases.description: Checks that the trainee-implemented method using OR logic returns a saved book when either dateAdded or lastDateWithdrawn matches the provided values.
